brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators expect that a culturally specific group intervention targeting African
      American smokers will result in greater smoking cessation rates compared to a standard
      intervention.

clinical_study.brief_title: Culturally Specific Interventions: African American Smokers
clinical_study.official_title: Culturally Specific Interventions and Acculturation in African American Smokers

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

collaborator.agency: University of Minnesota - Clinical and Translational Science Institute

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Factorial Assignment, Primary Purpose: Treatment
